item.description:
How about a good WWll Movie on a summer night when we can't fly because of metars? We've talked about doing this... So far, next Wednesday doesn't look so good to fly. If it changes, we can fly if we want.

But, I bet we can find a hangar, T or mine, and put a sheet up, open the doors, get some speakers and watch a good movie. Bring lawn chairs, food, and enjoy the summer evening.... We can either bring our favorite foods or order pizzas or something easy.

I know we have a P-51 movie. I have the classic, "A guy named Joe" with Spencer Tracy as WWll pilot... We can pick our favorite to watch....

Movie starts about 6:30ish.... Whaddaya say? I'm in...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Metar Movie Night...... Wednesday
